name: FOTA4Climate
goal:
FOTA4Climate unites people with various scientific and professional expertise towards a common goal of mitigating catastrophic climate change based on best available science and evidence.

We promote "pragmatic ecology" as means of using reason to meet often conflicting needs of nature and humanity choosing the "least bad" option that can maximize wellbeing of people and nature in a sustainable way.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Biodiversity, Climate Change mitigation and adaptation, energy, sustainability, evidence based policy.
